attributes.action: Every school should Allow year 11’s study leave
attributes.background: Teenagers that are ready to sit there GCSEs should be allowed time of(study leave)to focus on the things that they don’t feel comfortable with.Every child has different styles of how they work but many schools don’t allow for there students to have study leave!!

rejection.details:
We can open accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This issue is a decision for individual Headteachers.

You could raise this issue with your school's senior management or governing body.
